Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by kec1944 Just curious how everyone was first diagnosed? Was it through mammo, ultrasound, etc? Did you find a lump yourself, with or without pain? Thanks! I was just diagnosed with breast cancer found on Ct scan first after watching my right lung cavity after having lung cancer. 3 months later another scan was done on the chest to xheck for signs of cancer there where there is no lung. This recent sct scan showed a 10mm nodule on my right breast. The next thing they did was a 3d mamogram and ultra sound. Now im scheduled for a pet scan on Feb 1 to see where we go from there. I survived the lung cancer being 6 months since surgery and now i must battle breast cancer. Have you dr. Preformed these test and follow up. Best of luck to you‚ù§.
Posts.Title: How was your BC diagnosed?
